general-version: This number is used for internal processing of a validation file. It does NOT specify whether this is a modified copy of the original validation file.
general-currenttime: The date and time of the starting of the transfer described in this validation file.
file-size: The size of the file that has been transferred (at the time of sending)
file-path: The location where the transferred file was sent from (at the time of sending)
file-name: The full name of the transferred file (at the time of sending)
file-lastmodified: When the transferred file was last modified (before the time of sending)
file-license: The license under which the transferred file may be used by the receiving party
file-description: A description of the contents of the file that has been transferred, inputted by the sending party at the time of sending
file-hash: The keccak256 hash of the full file that has been transferred (at the time of sending)
sender-name: The name of the person who sent the file
sender-assemblid: The Assembl ID of the sender
sender-orcidid: The ORCID iD of the sender
receiver-name: The name of the person who received the file
receiver-assemblid: The Assembl ID of the receiver
receiver-orcidid: The ORCID iD of the receiver
